about_the_game:
Overview

The first skin in the Make Your Mark series awarded to Penguin after he won the Elemental Rivalries tournament on August 18th, 2018. In this series, players who win the tournament get to work with the developers to create a skin that is permanently added to the game on Steam. Keep an eye on the Steam Announcements page to see if there are more Mark Your Mark tournaments coming up.

Penguin Absa

  • Cute little penguins replace your clouds.
  • Be careful when taunting, someone might steal your mints!
  • Color scheme inspired by the custom colors that Penguin uses when he plays Absa.
